p: Based on the downscaling framework proposed by Guo [ 51] and Wang et al. [ 14], the climate change scenarios of the precipitation, T mean, T max and T min during 1976-2005 (baseline period) and 2021â€“2050 (future period) under the three RCP scenarios (RCP2.6, RCP4.5, and RCP8.5) in the HRB were generated.
